channel.title: I'm looking for a businesspartner
channel.description:
Hi, i'm looking for a businesspartner who has a good knowlegde of web designing and/or web developing. I will not pay you anything since my other thread got locked because he thought i was buying/selling something nor has this anything to do with web designing. Here's my locked thread:
Hi, i'm currently looking for a webdesigner/webdeveloper preferably as a partner, but i can just pay for your services too. What do i need? I need a simple commenting system written in PHP and the website must be designed also. More details of the commenting system and the design will be provided for whoever is interested. -I can't pay much, but i can try to get more money later. - As for those who are willing to be a partner of mine, the profits of the website will ofcourse be shared and you will receive a percentage of the profit. If the website does not generate profit after a while, i will pay you as much as i can.
The above quote is invalid and should be ignored. PM me if interested. [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] no buying or selling[/center]

item.title: I'm looking for a businesspartner
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

no buying or selling on these boards, I locked your last topic take a hint!

Read full topic

item.title: I'm looking for a businesspartner
item.dc:creator: @hellow123 hellow123
item.description:
@hellow123 wrote:

Hi, i’m looking for a businesspartner who has a good knowlegde of web designing and/or web developing.

I will not pay you anything since my other thread got locked because he thought i was buying/selling something nor has this anything to do with web designing.

Here’s my locked thread:

Hi, i'm currently looking for a webdesigner/webdeveloper preferably as a partner, but i can just pay for your services too.

What do i need? I need a simple commenting system written in PHP and the website must be designed also.
More details of the commenting system and the design will be provided for whoever is interested.

-I can’t pay much, but i can try to get more money later.

  • As for those who are willing to be a partner of mine, the profits of the website will ofcourse be shared and you will receive a percentage of the profit. If the website does not generate profit after a while, i will pay you as much as i can.

The above quote is invalid and should be ignored.

PM me if interested.
[center] no buying or selling[/center]
